(Simplified: 濑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 賴 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 賴 [ lài ] to depend on, to rely on; to bilk, to deny; poor
①從沙石上流過的急水：“石瀨兮淺淺”。

瀨字的基本解释

瀨
lài
见“濑”。

瀨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《集韻》落蓋切，去泰，來。］
亦作“瀬1”。“濑1”的繁体字。
(1)沙石上流过的水。
(2)急流。
(3)浅水沙石滩。
(4)通“厲”。
(5)水名。濑水。在广西壮族自治区，即荔江，源出荔浦县永福里，东至平乐县与漓江合。
(6)水名。濑水。在江苏省，溧水的别名。

瀨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀨； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页660第20
【唐韻】洛帶切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】落蓋切，?音賴。【說文】水流沙上也。【楚辭·九歌】石瀨兮淺淺。　又湍也。【前漢·武帝紀】遣甲爲下瀨將軍。【註】瀨，湍也。吳越謂之瀨，中國謂之磧。　又水名。【水經注】瀨水，出蒼梧荔浦縣西北魯山之東。　又【韻補】叶力制切，音利。【劉楨·魯都賦】龜螭潛滑于黃泥，文魚游踊于淸瀨。浚迅波以遠騰，正泌瀄于湄㵝。

Basic explanation of words
Se
lài
See "Sai".
Se
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Ji Yun" Go to Thailand, come. ]
Also known as "Set 1". The traditional characters of "Sai 1".
(1) Water flowing over sand and rocks.
(2) Rapids.
(3) Shallow water sandy beach.
(4) Through "strength".
(5) Water name. Sesui. In the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, Lijiang, it originates from Yongfuli, Lipu County, and ends at Pingle County and the Lijiang River in the east.
(6) Water name. Sesui. In Jiangsu Province, the alias of Lishui.
Se
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Lai; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 660 to 20
[Tang Yun] Luo Daiqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Luo Gaiqie,? Yin Lai. [Said the text] The water is also on the sand. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] Shi Lai Xi is shallow.　It's turbulent again. [Former Han·Wu Emperor Ji] sent Jia Jia as General Shise. [Note] Lai, Tuan also. Wuyue is called "Se," and China is called "Ji".　Also known as water. [Notes of Water Classics] Seshui, which is east of Mount Lu in the northwest of Lipu County, Cangwu.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Li cuts, the sound is good. 【Liu Zhen·Lu Du Fu】The turtles submerged in the yellow mud, while the manchurian fish swam in Chuise. Jun Xun wave is far away, and he is secretly in Mei 㵝.
